      • player

        public player(double x,
              double y,
              double w,
              double h)
        This constructor of the player class has the same arguments as of the tile class.
        Parameters:
        x - x position of the player.
        y - y position of the player.
        w - width of the player's hitbox.
        h - height of the player's hitbox.

    • Method Detail

      • fill

        public void fill(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        This method renders the sprite of the main player according to which animation is to be played and adjusts the sprite according to the hitbox.
        Overrides:
        fill in class knifeThrow.tile
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics2D object used to render the sprite on the screen.
